articles.description: Europe will need to "rewrite the rules" for Ryder Cup eligibility following Jon Rahm's move to LIV Golf, says Rory McIlroy.
articles.title: McIlroy wants Ryder Cup change after Rahm LIV move

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says the actions of Formula 1's governing body have been "unacceptable" in launching an inquiry into Toto and Susie Wolff.
articles.title: FIA inquiry into Wolff 'unacceptable' - Hamilton

articles.description: Russian and Belarusian athletes will be allowed to participate in the Paris 2024 Olympic Games as neutrals, the IOC confirms.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Russian and Belarusian athletes allowed to compete as neutrals

articles.description: Sports Minister Prince Abdulaziz bin Turki Al Faisal defends Saudi Arabia's right to host the 2034 World Cup in exclusive interview with BBC sports editor Dan Roan.
articles.title: Saudi World Cup sportswashing claims 'very shallow'

articles.description: Chelsea manager Emma Hayes says women are "routinely used to dealing with systemic misogyny and bullying" in football.
articles.title: Women used to 'systemic misogyny' in football - Hayes

articles.description: The landscape of men's professional golf is fundamentally shifting with Jon Rahm's switch to LIV Golf, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: 'Rahm's seismic LIV switch leaves golf deeply fractured'

articles.description: Former Arsenal star Theo Walcott explains why Bukayo Saka and Gabriel Martinelli are the modern-day wingers he loves to watch.
articles.title: The art of the winger & why Arsenal pair stand out - Walcott

articles.description: Buffalo Bills head coach Sean McDermott apologises for referencing the 9/11 hijackers in a team meeting in 2019.
articles.title: Bills coach apologises for 9/11 team talk reference

articles.description: Pep Guardiola believes the current winless streak is a valuable reality check for his Manchester City squad.
articles.title: Man City poor run a reality check - Guardiola

articles.description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag wins Premier League manager of the month while Harry Maguire wins the player award for November.
articles.title: Ten Hag & Maguire win November Premier League awards
